page.title: 16Farming
page.content: Most of our block is covered by farmland or forestry.The forests are not intensurely manage but they are generally worked.Trees planted and scrub cleared.The type of farming is predominently arable,only a couple of fields had cattle in.The mayjor crops are wheat and barley although a significant average of oil seed rape is planted and harvested .The arable land is intensively farmed with reliance on chemicals in various sprays to promote growth and bill weeds.One small area is used for market gardening and there is a small farm shop.Grassland is in the minority,mostly permenent pasture used for hay and grazing cattle,a little silage is also made.
